markdown:
FKE Industry 2024
=================

by [fydamohd](https://fke.utm.my/author/fydamohd/ "Posts by fydamohd")
 | Nov 8, 2024 | [Anouncement](https://fke.utm.my/category/anouncement/)
, [Faculty](https://fke.utm.my/category/faculty/)

![](https://fke.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/ebackdrop-FKE-Industry-2024-slide-980x551.png)

![](https://fke.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/Final-Design-Banner-FKE-Industry-Day-2024.jpg)

Assalamualaikum w.b.t and greetings,

Y. Brs. Prof./Prof. Madya/Dr./Tuan/Puan/Saudara,

We are excited to inform you that the Faculty of Electrical Engineering, Universiti Teknologi Malaysia (UTM) is organising the FKE Industry 2024.  
You are cordially invited to attend the session with the following details:

**Date:**  
11th November 2024 (Monday)

**Time:**  
8.30 am – 5.00 pm

**Venue:**  
P19A, FACULTY OF ELECTRICAL ENGINEERING, UTM

**Note:**  
Attendance is compulsory for 4th-year Capstone (part of the in-lab assessment) and Biomedical System Design students for the Industrial Talk (11.00-1.30 pm). Packed lunch will be provided only for Capstone and Biomedical System Design students.

**Activities:**  
Visit various company/research booths  
Employment and internship opportunities: If interested, you may drop your resume/ CV at this link before: [https://tinyurl.com/resumeFKE](https://tinyurl.com/resumeFKE)
  
List of available vacancies: [https://shorturl.at/YoebL](https://shorturl.at/YoebL)
  
Join industrial talk  
Discuss potential collaboration – research projects, MoU, CSR, satellite labs, etc

The event programme book can be found here:  
[https://anyflip.com/xbrne/trxx/](https://anyflip.com/xbrne/trxx/)

Looking forward to seeing you all there!

[![](https://fke.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/WhatsApp-Image-2024-11-10-at-10.15.36-AM.jpeg)](https://fke.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/WhatsApp-Image-2024-11-10-at-10.15.36-AM.jpeg)
